message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product for $180. I think it's a great value and I'm confident you'll love it!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value you're providing, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay $150 for the product.
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go below $165. I'm confident the product's value is worth more than that. Let me see if I can meet you in the middle.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I appreciate your offer, but I still believe I can secure the product at a lower price. I am willing to pay $150 for it.
